Latest Projects

Full Stack Engineer

Ikeya

A website curated for home design and inspiration. Sign in to design unique rooms and fill them with furniture. Users can also browse rooms created by other users for design inspiration.

View Project
Full Stack Eningeer

CarCar

A comprehensive platform that enables users to effortlessly create and manage automobiles and organize a team of technicians and salespeople, as well as oversee service appointments.

View Project
Full Stack Engineer

Conference GO!

A web application for conference management, allowing the seamless creation and management of locations, conferences, and presentations, while also allowing the ability to attend conferences.

View Project

Ikeya

Ikeya is a full-stack web application where unique users can sign in and begin to design the room of their dreams. Upon login, users are directed to their 'dashboard' page, where they have the ability to view all of their rooms, create new rooms, new furniture, or edit and delete existing data.

Users can navigate to the 'all rooms' page to see rooms created by other users to spark their own imagination. Here users can search or filter rooms based on a query.

CarCar

CarCar is a full-stack web application desgined to be an all-in-one stop to manage car dealerships. Dealership employees have the ability to create and manage automobile inventory, including automobile manufacturer, make and model. The dealership can create and manage their sales and technician employees.

Individuals can browse automobile inventory and register as a dealership customer or create a service appointment for their vehicle. From there, sales employees and service technicians can manage dealership sales and service appointments.

Conference GO!

Conference GO is an application designed to simplify the entire event experience. The platform allows users to create and organize conferences, presentations and locations.

Third-party API data for location-specific weather updates and images allow attendees to plan around the event with real-time information. Potential attendees can browse the selection of active conferences prior to choosing which to attend.
